description:
***WOW! 500 STUDENTS IN THE FIRST MONTH!!! THANK YOU!!!***

Would you like to raise your TOEFL test score by without extra studying?

Do you want to know which test seats will raise your score and what 7 things you should never bring to your exam?

Hi, my name is Alex and I have been a professional ESL tutor for years, as well as a TOEFL proctor and site administrator.

Over the course of my class, you will learn the ins and outs of the testing process, what to avoid on test day, and how to maximize your language skills for the exam. You will discover strategies to increase your persuasive speech, boost your listening and reading comprehension, all in less than an hour.

I also have a tailored positive-habits timeline that follows your journey from 2 weeks to 20 minutes before the test. So that you will go into the exam feeling confident and strong, just as many of my students have.

For example, Shoya went from scoring a 68 to an 82 in just over a month, which qualified him to enrole in a U.S. college. Yuki went from a 12 on her speaking portion to a 22 between her first and second test and improved her conversational skills. So join these successful students by enrolling in my course for you; Increase Your TOEFL Score Without Studying.
title: Increase your TOEFL score by 20 points in less than an hour
